posts.post_content:
I have the following Postcards for sale. 
The H.M. Taylor Detroit was previously in a SGC 10 (1) holder. It's a nice card with no creases, just a little corner wear and of course the writing/postmark on the reverse which I actually like. Price is $675 delivered. 

The Cubs postcard is also in nice condition, just corner wear. Price is $450 delivered.

Just about any form of payment is ok. If you have any questions let me know.
[url]mhgt2833@gmail.com[/url]
Thanks
Mike
